item.title: PHP, OpenSSL and ftp_ssl_connect() on Win32
item.description: For quite some time I’ve been wanting to compile PHP for the sole purpose of using the http://us.php.net/ftp_ssl_connect function. According to the PHP manual: When I first saw this I was disappointed. I thought I would never be able to compile PHP myself. It just felt like a daunting task to get my system configured correctly. …Well, it’s not perfect, but I have been able to get it to work, and I’ve even been able to patch up the PHP code itself!
